txt.en: The scout gives you a missive to defeat trolls.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>Warning: This quest requires Gloomingtarn: Drôk-and-Kharb to be underway. If that quest has been completed or failed, you will be unable to exit and re-enter this instance in order to complete this quest.</rgb>

Mineral riches await those who brave the craggy caverns of Gloomingtarn.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>Warning: This quest requires Gloomingtarn: Drôk-and-Kharb to be underway. If that quest has been completed or failed, you will be unable to exit and re-enter this instance in order to complete this quest.</rgb>
